mapper.select: select * from health_clock where snum = #{snum} order by health_clock.create_time DESC limit ${limit} offset ${page};

SELECT h.id,h.snum,h.local,h.confirmed,h.asymptomatic,h.today_temp,h.fever_and_cough,h.cough,h.recent_home,h.create_time,h.health_status FROM health_clock as h LEFT JOIN `user` ON `user`.snum = h.snum WHERE `user`.counselor_id= (SELECT counselor.id FROM counselor LEFT JOIN `user` ON `user`.snum = counselor.cnum WHERE snum=#{snum}) order by h.create_time DESC limit #{limit} offset #{page};
SELECT count(*) FROM health_clock WHERE TO_DAYS(#{create_time}) = TO_DAYS(NOW()) AND snum = #{snum}
